bitenum.description: Up to 12 bits wide. This size cannot be used with 24-bit data
Up to 20 bits wide. This size cannot be used with data sizes other than 8

bitfield.description: Chip Select Baud Rate and Multiple Sub-Mode Configuration enable
Chip Select Baud Rate and Multiple Sub-Mode Configuration enable

bitenum.description: Only to be used with Host Bus quad chip select. In quad chip select mode, CS0n maps to 0x6000.0000 and CS1n maps to 0x8000.0000
Only to be used with Host Bus quad chip select. In quad chip select mode, CS2n maps to 0xA000.0000 and CS3n maps to 0xC000.0000
Trigger when there are 1 or more entries in the NBRFIFO
Trigger when there are 2 or more entries in the NBRFIFO
Trigger when there are 4 or more entries in the NBRFIFO
Trigger when there are 6 or more entries in the NBRFIFO
Trigger when there are 7 or more entries in the NBRFIFO
Trigger when there are 8 entries in the NBRFIFO
Interrupt is triggered while WRFIFO is empty.
Interrupt is triggered until there are only two slots available. Thus, trigger is deasserted when there are two WRFIFO entries present. This configuration is optimized for bursts of 2
Interrupt is triggered until there is one WRFIFO entry available. This configuration expects only single writes
Trigger interrupt when WRFIFO is not full, meaning trigger will continue to assert until there are four entries in the WRFIFO

register.description: EPI Error and Interrupt Status and Clear

CS1n Write Wait State Minus One

CS1n Write Wait State Minus One

CS2n Read Wait State Minus One
CS2n Write Wait State Minus One
CS3n Read Wait State Minus One
CS3n Write Wait State Minus One
CS3n Read Wait State Minus One
CS3n Write Wait State Minus One
